name: TrainingRobot
description:
This is a fighting game I made for a party.

There's not much to it, but I may add more later; like additional characters.

When both players have been claimed with input devices, the fight starts. The fight resets after a player wins. Fight forever; you can't quit.

-Supports gamepads and switch joy-cons.
-Move and two buttons for punch and kick.
-Hit space to play with keyboard input (Arrows, Z, X. This can claim both players if you hit space twice)
